name: Find the door
description:
Find the door

  • Try to find the door and win the game
  • push boxes around to get over obstacles
  • You can use the Xray Vision to see moe objects 
  • Hitting Spikes, Saws and Bullets kills u instantly 
  • no checkpoints, so don`t die :)
  • Turn on sound 

The game is still a prototype so there are some bugs around.

I couldn`t really stick that good to the theme but i tried anyways to have a finished game.
